dataList.name: Bloody Point
dataList.desc: Heal 2 SP on self On Hit against targets with [Laceration]

dataList.name: Reinforcements
dataList.desc: When an ally is defeated, gain 1 Slot next turn (max 2)

dataList.name: Sanguine Pointillism
dataList.desc: Heal 2 SP on self On Hit against targets with [Laceration]

dataList.name: Reinforcements
dataList.desc: When an ally is defeated, gain 1 Slot next turn (max 2)

dataList.name: A Single Point of Art
dataList.desc: Clash Win: all allies, including this unit, heals 3 SP

dataList.name: Body Augment - Phys. Boost
dataList.desc: Turn End: if this unit's SP is at -10 or less, gain 3 [AttackUp] next turn.

dataList.name: Reinforcements
dataList.desc: When an ally is defeated, gain 1 Slot next turn (max 3)

dataList.name: Body Augment - Cooldown
dataList.desc: When in Panic, reset SP to 0 at Turn End.

dataList.name: This Can't Be
dataList.desc: Every time an ally is defeated, gain 2 [AttackDown] starting next turn.

dataList.name: This Time, I Win...!
dataList.desc: If this unit wins after 5+ Clashes, deal +50% more damage

dataList.name: Dead Rabbits Boss?
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: apply 1 [Enhancement] to 2 other allies with the lowest SP
For this Encounter, gain a Slot every time an ally is defeated

dataList.name: Antagonism
dataList.desc: If the target's current HP is higher than this unit's, Clash Power +2 and deal +20% more damage

dataList.name: Long-awaited Moment
dataList.desc:
Clash Win: Heal 5 SP on self
Clash Lose against Heathcliff: Lose 5 SP and gain 2 Bind next turn. (Once per turn)
If this unit did not land a single hit against Heathcliff this turn, lose 5 SP at Turn End

dataList.name: Useless Fools...
dataList.desc: If an enemy defeats an ally, gain 1 [Enhancement] and 1 [Agility] next turn (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Spiked Bat
dataList.desc: On Hit, inflict bonus Pierce damage equal to 50% of the damage dealt

dataList.name: Heart of Vengeance
dataList.desc:
Turn End: If Panicked, recover from Panic at the next Turn Start and reset SP to 0.
Turn End: If this unit recovers from Panic, gain 2 [Enhancement] and 2 [Agility] at the next Turn Start

dataList.name: Vying Spirit
dataList.desc: Defense Level +1 for every 10% missing HP on self (rounded down)
